reviewText: BEST performance video on Bejart that I know!
GREAT SELLER, INCREDIBLE PRODUCT, SUPER QUALITY.
Great dance works from a great choreographer.
Disk made in France; wouldn't play in this region . I'll return it for credit.

At no time does the camera select a single prospective.
The constant cutting is nerve racking and does a great
disservice to the structure and visual appearance of
each of the pieces. It makes me wish I had a seat in the
audience.

I have watched this DVD over and over. If you love the skill, beauty and graceful art of contemprary ballet, you will be enthralled by Bejart's outstanding choreography and some of the most beautiful, talented dancers of our time. This is the best evening's televison viewing I've had in a very long time. Bravo to the dancers and thank you for those absolutely magical performances!!
